charges.charge_description: DRIVING UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL 2ND OFFENSE WITHIN 5 YEARS - 18 USC, 7&;13, assim. Code of Va., Section 18.2-266 and 18.2-270(1)

charges.charge_disposition: $500 fine; $25 special assessment; 22 consecutive days in jail, to report 10/22/15 by 10:00 a.m., with credit for time served

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed with prejudice on Govt motion

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed with prejudice on Govt motion
